title: How to participate in tournaments while staying at home?

replies.body: Our Community Events page has some tournaments that you could join in person, I know for sure, but I'm not 100% sure if anyone ever hosts online tournys through our site. It looks like [**this Reddit page**](https://www.reddit.com/r/LoLtournamentz/) might be pretty useful for finding online hosted ones!

You can try to find tournaments online, they usually just have a custom game you join or they give you an official tournament code.

Allow me to be real with you for a second here, I wouldn't think about tournaments at silver, I'd focus on improving first. Don't take this the wrong way, just being honest with you.
